name: Nuclear Dump Truck Driver
description:
Drive the nuclear waste dump truck transport crane in the offroad simulator game. Be an expert waste truck driver in the winter snow offroad. Be the professional nuclear dump crane driver. Transport the nuclear waste from the industrial area and dump into the wastage area. Fill up the patrol from the filling station and get into the waste truck transport crane and be the professional dump truck driver. Drive on to the extreme offroads in the mountainous area.

Be the expert driver of the toxic waste dump truck. Go to the nuclear power plant in the industrial area and load the nuclear toxic waste into the transport crane. Drive your waste truck to the wastage area and dump into it. complete different tasks regarding the transportation of toxic waste. Be careful about the patrol as it should be filled properly otherwise you will lose the level. Experience different environments and modes in this game.

Enjoy and drive the heavy toxic waste truck on the off roads of forest. Complete the levels and read the objectives carefully as these will help to complete the levels successfully. Be the expert driver of the waste dump truck. Maintain the specific distance of your nuclear waste dump truck crane from the front army truck otherwise you will be going to lose the level. Follow the map directions to transport the toxic nuclear waste from the industrial area power plant to the offroad wastage dump. Enjoy multiple exciting and thrilling missions of dump crane nuclear waste transport truck game now. be the professional offroad truck driver now.
• 3 different environments of the nuclear waste truck crane
• 3 heavy dump crane to select
• Exciting missions in each level of the nuclear waste truck
• Transport the toxic waste from power plant of industrial area to wastage dump area
• Engaging and interactive gameplay controls
• 3D HD environment of industrial area, offroad forest and winter offroad
